paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 variant N372H, including clinical significance and penetrance data.

functional_data.summary: No significant association with ovarian cancer risk was found.

variants.additional_notes: The variant showed no association with ovarian cancer risk in the studied population.
key_quotes: The other 5 SNPs in BRCA2... showed no association with ovarian cancer risk.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in BRCA2 was reported, and it was classified as a variant of uncertain significance.
